description.black-white:
The user gets revenge for a fainted ally.
If an ally fainted in the previous turn,
this attack’s damage increases.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.
effect.shortEffect: Has double power if a friendly Pokémon fainted last turn.
